```{r}
Caps = function(x) {
  s = strsplit(x, " ")[[1]]
  txt = paste(toupper(substring(s,1,1)), substring(s,2), sep="", collapse=" ")
  return(txt[[1]])
}
```

```{r}
top5Chems = storage %>% 
  group_by(Material.Name) %>% 
  summarise(total = sum(Capacity.in.Gallons)) %>% 
  top_n(5,total)

storageFiltered = semi_join(storage, top5Chems, by = 'Material.Name')

storageFiltered %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=reorder(Site.Type.Name,Capacity.in.Gallons, function(x) sum(x)), y=Capacity.in.Gallons)) + 
  geom_col(aes(fill=Material.Name)) +
  labs(title='Total Capacity by Site',
       x='Sites',
       y='Capacity in Gallons') +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette='Set1') +
  coord_flip() + 
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.key=element_blank())

```

storage %>%

  group_by(Install.Date) %>% 
  summarise(sum_ = sum(Capacity.in.Gallons)) %>% 
  bind_rows(closed) %>% 
  arrange(Install.Date) %>% 
  mutate(cumsum_ = cumsum(sum_))

```{r}
material_name = '#6 fuel oil'
closed = storage %>% 
  filter(Material.Name == material_name) %>% 
  group_by(Close.Date) %>% 
  summarise(sum_ = -sum(Capacity.in.Gallons)) %>% 
  rename(., 'Date' = 'Close.Date')


total = storage %>% 
  filter(Material.Name==material_name) %>% 
  group_by(Install.Date) %>% 
  rename(., 'Date' = 'Install.Date') %>% 
  summarise(sum_ = sum(Capacity.in.Gallons)) %>% 
  bind_rows(closed) %>% 
  arrange(Date) %>% 
  mutate(cumsum_ = cumsum(sum_)/1e6)


total %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Date, y = cumsum_)) +
  geom_step() +
  labs(title='Facility Install Date and Capacity',
       x='Install Date',
       y='Capacity') +
  scale_fill_brewer(palette='Set1') +
  theme_bw() +
  theme(legend.key=element_blank())
```

## Bivariate Graphical
```{r}
fig <- function(width, heigth){
     options(repr.plot.width = width, repr.plot.height = heigth)
}

material_name = "gasoline"
storage %>% 
  filter(Material.Name == material_name) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = Tank.Location, y = log(Capacity.in.Gallons))) +
  geom_violin() +
  coord_flip()

options(repr.plot.width = 14, repr.plot.height = 200)
storage %>% 
  filter(Material.Name == material_name) %>% 
  group_by(County.Name) %>% 
  summarise(total = log(sum(Capacity.in.Gallons))) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x = reorder(County.Name,total), y = total)) +
  geom_point() +
  coord_flip()
```
